name: Lifty
public_notice: Liquidifty (LQT) has rebranded to Lifty (LQT). For more information, please view this announcement on their Twitter.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Lifty platform is delighted to present the LQT token — the native Liquidifty platform token that will act as a utility carrier within the system, allowing users and holders to gain access to a broad range of exciting and interesting features.
